metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32265 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-637. A global-buffer-overflow exists in the function AP4_MemoryByteStream::WritePartial() located in Ap4ByteStream.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause code execution or information disclosure.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
